title: Well-Read Lives - main idea of first paragraph

content.question: Which statement best describes the main idea of the first paragraph?

choices.label: Literary demands on children increased as they grew older.
Children's educational opportunities differed based on social class.
Writing tasks featured prominently in children's lives.
Women rather than men studied literature throughout their lives.

content.answer: Writing tasks featured prominently in children's lives.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
